message.raw:
Thread synchronisation and exception handling sorted with much help from Chris Billington.
This crashes 'cleanly' on trigger failure, timing out.
Appears to also die cleanly on commanded abort, but should clean up and continue.
Note changes to alazar error handler in atsapi.py, hopefully backwards compatible
